statements.select:
select a.LogId , a.req.ErrorNumber = ex.HResult; , u1.UserName , a.LoginId , a.Version , a.MainSkin , a.GridSkin , a.IpAddress , a.MacAddress , case when a.LoginDtime is null then '' else Replace(Convert(varchar(10), a.LoginDtime , 111),'/','.') + ' ' + Convert(varchar(8), a.LoginDtime , 108) end as LoginDtime , case when a.LogoutDtime is null then '' else Replace(Convert(varchar(10), a.LogoutDtime, 111),'/','.') + ' ' + Convert(varchar(8), a.LogoutDtime, 108) end as LogoutDtime , a.Status from LoginLog a WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN Users u1 WITH (NOLOCK) on a.req.ErrorNumber = ex.HResult; = U1.USER_ID
And a.Name like '%' + #FindText# + '%'
Order By a.LogId Desc
